parameters.name: Style1
parameters.description: Arrowhead style of first arrowhead as defined in swArrowStyle_e

parameters.name: Style2
parameters.description: Arrowhead style of second arrowhead as defined in swArrowStyle_e

title: IDisplayDimension.GetArrowHeadStyle2
description: Gets the arrowhead style used by this display dimension.
signature:
System.Boolean GetArrowHeadStyle2( 
   out System.Int32
Style1
,
   out System.Int32
Style2
)

parameters.name: Style1
parameters.description: Arrowhead style of first arrowhead as defined in swArrowStyle_e

parameters.name: Style2
parameters.description: Arrowhead style of second arrowhead as defined in swArrowStyle_e

returns: True if the styles are set, false if not
remarks:
The arrowhead style for a display dimension is controlled by a value stored in one of two places: on the owning document or on the individual display dimension.
Use this method and
IDisplayDimension::GetUseDocArrowHeadStyle
to get the current values for these settings. Use
IDisplayDimension::SetArrowHeadStyle2
to set the arrowhead style.
